name: Firefly Catcher (GGJ '21)
description:
Play as a small fox lost in a dark forest. Find your away around the maze-like level and capture fireflies to increase your lantern's light and your jump ability! If you can find (and illuminate) the two stone lanterns (and then find the exit) You Win! Oh and avoid the water. - DEVLOG - shorturl.at/zHIMT

Global Game Jam '21 Submission for Playcrafting NYC

Credits

  • Music and Audio - Tomer Baruch (tomerbaruch.com) - instagram: tomerbrc
  • Game and Art - Jonny Aiello - twitter: @NinjaBoots88
  • Tileset - Open Pixel Project
